# âœ… **Lombok-Generated Code (Fully Expanded)**

```java
package com.example.lets_play.dto;

import java.time.Instant;
import java.util.Objects;

public class ApiError {
    private Instant timestamp = Instant.now();
    private int status;
    private String error;
    private String message;
    private String path;

    // --- NoArgsConstructor generated by @NoArgsConstructor ---
    public ApiError() {
        super();
    }

    // --- Your explicit constructor remains untouched ---
    public ApiError(int status, String error, String message, String path) {
        this.status = status;
        this.error = error;
        this.message = message;
        this.path = path;
    }

    // --- Getters generated by @Data ---
    public Instant getTimestamp() {
        return this.timestamp;
    }

    public int getStatus() {
        return this.status;
    }

    public String getError() {
        return this.error;
    }

    public String getMessage() {
        return this.message;
    }

    public String getPath() {
        return this.path;
    }

    // --- Setters generated by @Data ---
    public void setTimestamp(Instant timestamp) {
        this.timestamp = timestamp;
    }

    public void setStatus(int status) {
        this.status = status;
    }

    public void setError(String error) {
        this.error = error;
    }

    public void setMessage(String message) {
        this.message = message;
    }

    public void setPath(String path) {
        this.path = path;
    }

    // --- equals() generated by Lombok @Data ---
    @Override
    public boolean equals(Object o) {
        if (o == this) return true;
        if (!(o instanceof ApiError)) return false;
        ApiError other = (ApiError) o;
        return Objects.equals(this.timestamp, other.timestamp)
                && this.status == other.status
                && Objects.equals(this.error, other.error)
                && Objects.equals(this.message, other.message)
                && Objects.equals(this.path, other.path);
    }

    // --- hashCode() generated by Lombok @Data ---
    @Override
    public int hashCode() {
        return Objects.hash(timestamp, status, error, message, path);
    }

    // --- toString() generated by Lombok @Data ---
    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "ApiError(timestamp=" + this.timestamp
                + ", status=" + this.status
                + ", error=" + this.error
                + ", message=" + this.message
                + ", path=" + this.path + ")";
    }
}
```

---

# ğŸ“Œ Notes About Lombok Behavior

### `@Data` =

-   `@Getter`
    
-   `@Setter`
    
-   `@ToString`
    
-   `@EqualsAndHashCode`
    
-   `@RequiredArgsConstructor` (not applied here since you already have constructors)
    

### `@NoArgsConstructor`

Generates only:

```java
public ApiError() {
    super();
}
```

Since you already created a custom constructor, Lombok **does not remove it**.

---> [[super()]]
